Question
========
Which command checks the installed Quarto version?

Answerlist
----------
* quarto check
* quarto --help
* quarto render
* quarto --version

Solution
========
`quarto --version` prints the installed Quarto version if the tool is available.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* False
* True
